summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein, discussing a change in schedule and the need for a fax number to complete an ISDA agreement. It includes details about a lunch meeting planned at Epstein's home.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and is involved in the communication regarding the ISDA agreement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is requesting a fax number to complete the ISDA agreement and is involved in the scheduling of a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Harry Seller
persons.context: Harry Seller is included in the email chain and is asked to provide a fax number.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the subject of the meeting and is mentioned as having a lunch scheduled at his home.

connections.description: Lesley Groff appears to be coordinating meetings and communications on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein.
Amanda Kirby is involved in the preparation of an agreement related to Jeffrey Epstein's business dealings.
Lesley Groff includes Harry Seller in the email chain for assistance with the fax number.

events.title: Lunch Meeting
events.description: A lunch meeting is scheduled at Jeffrey Epstein's home.

keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Amanda Kirby is requesting a fax number to complete an ISDA agreement.
A lunch meeting is scheduled at Jeffrey Epstein's home on October 4, 2013.
Harry Seller is included in the email for assistance with the fax number.
The correspondence is marked as confidential.
